meanings.definition: The act of putting on clothes.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed choosing different dressings for her outfits.
meanings.sent2: Proper dressings are important for formal events.
meanings.sent3: The dressings for the play were so colorful, they looked like a rainbow!
meanings.sent4: Her unique dressings reflected her vibrant personality.
meanings.sent5: The dressings of the actors brought the characters to life on stage.

meanings.definition: A sauce or seasoning used on salads or other dishes.
meanings.sent1: I prefer light dressings on my salads.
meanings.sent2: The chef's special dressings added a burst of flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The dressings on the salad danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The dressings of herbs and spices created a symphony of taste.
meanings.sent5: The creamy dressings perfectly complemented the fresh vegetables.
